textContent: Melee abilities that can be used with two 1handers have a 0% proc chance to proc the same spell but with your left hand. When you dual wield, those chances are increased by 100%.
title: Dual wielding abilities
textContentHtml: Melee abilities that can be used with two 1handers have a 0% proc chance to proc the same spell but with your left hand. When you dual wield, those chances are increased by 100%.
